Message: Fix for parameters which use a projection view as data type
Idoc.SendAndWait() returned the wrong value. This is fixed now. In case of succes true is returned.
Fix for ERPException.ABAPException with Changing parameters (was always null since 4.5.1.x)
Added output length and conversion routine name to TableColumn
Automatic detection of Request ID when doing a Repair Request
Added metadata retrieval to TableDefinition and TableLookUp
Fix for parameters of ABAP type p
Added addtional checks for Data Package Verification
Added feature to always use the raw hierarchy table for backward-compatiblity
New feature was added to enable two additional columns in DeltaQ output: DataPackageID and RowCounter
